description: Section 73 application to vary conditions 1 (approved drawings and documents), 2 (time limit), 2a (permitted uses), 5 (Use Class restriction), 7 (construction and environmental management plan) , 8 (construction logistics plan), 10 (contaminated land), 11 (arboricultural method statement), 16 ( BREEAM assessment), 21 (Cycle parking), 22 (Delivery and Servicing Plan), 24 (air quality), 25 (noise & vibration), 28 (Hotel Management Plan) and 30 (coach parking bay) and deletion of condition 6 (Use Class Restriction) of planning permission 19/0006/FUMOPDC as amended by 23/0134/NMAOPDC and 25/0002/NMAOPDC for 'Demolition of the existing building and redevelopment to provide a mixed use building including flexible industrial uses (Class B2/B8) and a hotel (Class C1), associated car parking, servicing and all necessary enabling works'. Amendments are proposed primarily to reduce the approved floor to ceiling heights within the industrial floorspace, to remove the approved office floorspace, and to incorporate additional floors of hotel accommodation within the approved building envelope.
